title: 07/26/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/26/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
In this Best of The Herd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--reacts live to the news of Aaron Rodgers intending to play for the Packers this season. Doug breaks down the bleak future of the Big XII Conference as Oklahoma and Texas are officially headed to the SEC. Former NFL scout and "3 and Out" podcast host John Middlekauff joins Doug to talk Aaron Rodgers, Davante Adams, Tom Brady, Deshaun Watson and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
